docs.snippet: Among the sports with high rates of eye injuries: basketball, baseball, softball, soccer and cycling....
docs.lead_paragraph: Among the sports with high rates of eye injuries: basketball, baseball, softball, soccer and cycling.
docs.abstract: Dr R Sterling Haring study in journal JAMA Ophthalmology examines hospital data on eye injuries sustained by young athletes and supports recommendation that athletes wear protective googles; surprisingly, cycling and women's soccer are among most frequent contributors to eye injuries.

headline.main: Eye Injuries in Youth Sports Are Surprisingly Common

docs.snippet: When Bill White’s S.U.V. was stolen on Nov. 2, it contained gifts, memorabilia and something more precious: two urns containing the cremated remains of his parents....
docs.lead_paragraph: When Bill White’s S.U.V. was stolen on Nov. 2, it contained gifts, memorabilia and something more precious: two urns containing the cremated remains of his parents.
docs.abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column discusses theft of vehicle belonging to Bill White, philanthropist and former chief executive of Intrepid Sea, Air & Space Museum, after it was left on Manhattan street; car was later recovered, but contents, including urns containing ashes of White's parents, were not.

headline.main: Dear Mom and Dad: Sorry About the Car Break-In. Wish You Were Here.
headline.print_headline: Mom and Dad, Missing From the Trunk
